title: Patching is slow
body: I have nbn, my.internet speed is 30mbps, when updating/downloading on steam is around 300-350 KBps but whenever im patching on league its only 1-5KBps please help. Im with tbn btw

replies.body: Try toggling the **Allow Peer-to-Peer Transfer** option found by clicking the gear on the top right of the launcher.
